Dinner

Some great places to go when you want to grab dinner.

Nopalito

Located at 1224 9th Ave San Francisco

High class Mexican food in the Panhandle

View Yelp Page

Nara

Located at 1515 Polk St San Francisco

I love this sushi place/bar! Try the hamachi truffle with their sakes!

View Yelp Page

Perilla

Located at 836 Irving St San Francisco

Solid Vietnamese food. Try the chicken ramen or garlic noodles. Also, this was n8 and Joe's favorite place last summer and you know how n8 feels about pho.

View Yelp Page

Brenda's Soul French food

Located at 652 Polk St San Francisco

New orleans style food! Quality comfort food.

View Yelp Page

Burgermeister

Located at 759 Columbus Ave San Francisco

Great burger place in Cole Valley! The avocado burger is top.

View Yelp Page

Halu

Located at 312 8th Ave San Francisco

Japanese street food! Seriously solid skewers.

View Yelp Page

Zuni Café

Located at 1658 Market St San Francisco

Expensive, date night sort of place that I happily tried by myself. Pretty good.

View Yelp Page

Shanghai Dumpling King

Located at 3319 Balboa St San Francisco

I haven't personally been here, but it was recommended to me by someone who is great at food.

View Yelp Page

Souvla

Located at 517 Hayes St San Francisco

Really, really good Greek food. I like their chicken salad and fries with garlic Greek yogurt sauce.

View Yelp Page
